Standard era definitions

Source: R/era.R
eras.Rd

Definitions of common eras and time scales.

eras() lists all available era definitions. eras(label) looks up a specific era by its unique, abbreviated name (e.g. "cal BP").

eras(label = NA)

Arguments

label

(Optional) Abbreviated names(s) of eras to look up.

Value

A table of era definitions. This can be passed to era() to construct an era object.

Details

Looking up eras by label uses partial matching.

See also

Other era definition functions: era()

Examples

# List all available eras
eras()

#> # A tibble: 31 x 6
#>    label  epoch name                                     unit    scale direction
#>    <chr>  <dbl> <chr>                              <era_year>    <int>     <dbl>
#>  1 BP      1950 Before Prese… Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0        -1
#>  2 cal BP  1950 Before Prese… Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0        -1
#>  3 BC         0 Before Christ Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0        -1
#>  4 BCE        0 Before Commo… Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0        -1
#>  5 AD         0 Anno Domini   Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0         1
#>  6 CE         0 Common Era    Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0         1
#>  7 a       1950 annum         Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e0        -1
#>  8 ka      1950 kiloannum     Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e3        -1
#>  9 Ma      1950 megaannum     Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e6        -1
#> 10 Ga      1950 gigaannum     Gregorian years (365.2425 days)   1.00e9        -1
#> # … with 21 more rows

# Look up a specific era by label
eras("cal BP")

#> # A tibble: 1 x 6
#>   label  epoch name                                      unit scale direction
#>   <chr>  <dbl> <chr>                               <era_year> <int>     <dbl>
#> 1 cal BP  1950 Before Present Gregorian years (365.2425 days)     1        -1

# With partial matching
eras("cal")

#> # A tibble: 1 x 6
#>   label  epoch name                                      unit scale direction
#>   <chr>  <dbl> <chr>                               <era_year> <int>     <dbl>
#> 1 cal BP  1950 Before Present Gregorian years (365.2425 days)     1        -1
